title: ‘Talent crunch is real’: Wipro’s Rashid Premji on tech industry - Moneycontrol.com
content: ‘Talent crunch is real’: Wipro’s Rashid Premji on tech industry  Moneycontrol.com
description: Rishad Premji told Moneycontrol, "The number one challenge companies have right now is talent. So any company that can win the war for talent will be the winner.”
